original.text:
Me and my family decided to stop in Cordoba while traveling across Spain. Found Easy Locker which is super convenient from the train station. The process is super easy and convenient. Iâ€™ve contacted the customer support via WhatsApp and they were very supportive and responded immediately.
Definitely a good experience and recommend

original.text:
I discovered this place by accident on my way from the train station. It's entirely new, very clean, and seems to be very secure too. All instructions on how to get inside and manage the locker were very clear.
Overall, highly recommend!
